net.tasmod.tools

Class TickrateChanger

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tasmod.tools.TickrateChanger

  • public class TickrateChanger
extends java.lang.Object
    The TickrateChanger is the part of the mod, that slows down the game to allow for more precise inputs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float[] availableGamespeeds

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void faster()
      Increases the gamespeed by one (see availableGamespeeds).
      static long getMilliseconds() 
      static void slower()
      Decreases the gamespeed by one (see availableGamespeeds).
      static void toggleTickadvance()
      Enters or leaves tick advance
      static void updateTickrate(float gamespeed)

      • updateTickrate

        public static void updateTickrate(float gamespeed)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to slow down the game. It replaces the 'timerSpeed' field in the Timer class.
        Parameters:
        gamespeed - New Speed of game (1.0 = normal speed)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception whenever invalid reflection target is set
